title: Software Development Engineer II
description: At Amazon, I design and build backend systems that power automated content publishing for Prime Video. I've led the architecture and delivery of distributed microservices on AWS (Lambda, ECS Fargate, SQS/SNS, DynamoDB) that streamline how studio content is validated and released. My work has helped automate hundreds of quality checks, improve release reliability for ~600K customers, and reduce AWS costs by around $2M annually. I also designed an MCP server that enables agentic workflows and accelerates internal development across teams.

title: Senior Associate Software Engineer
description: During my time at Workday, I contributed to several key initiatives in the Business Intelligence and Development Platforms. I developed a report suggestion framework that helped internal developers optimize report generation through custom rules. I also worked on enhancing a low-code application platform using TypeScript, React, and Scala, enabling users to build Workday applications more efficiently. I improved the development pipeline for ML applications by optimizing deployment processes with TeamCity and created automation scripts for VMware-based ML environments, which improved development agility and environment consistency.
